title: With You
lyrics:
I just want a good time with you
With you bonaego sip-eo
I just want spend some time
With you with you with you
Biga naelil ttaen naega usan-i doeeojulge

I can be your sunshine in the rain for you

Balam-i bul ttaen neoui wanbyeog-i dwaejullae

Hangyeoul bam-e I’ll be your hot chocolate

Jinan gyeoul iyagineun jinan iyagiya

Ijen bom-inde i kkochbat-en neowa na dan dul-iya

‘yeoleumgat-eun neo’ga balaboneun geon nappun-ilkka

Neoga eodie seoissdeon I want to be where you are

Um~ gam-i wass-eo jom seolle ganman-e ginjangtass-eo

Nan da boyeo god sijag-i doel uli yeon-aeui hanpyeon

Cheosgeol-eumbuteo neom-eojyeodo uliui saiga jom meol-eojyeodo

Neo hana gajil su issdamyeon I want to risk it all for you but

I don’t want to be your friend chingu saineun silh-eunde

Uyeonhi mannan uli dul-eun hanjeongpan 1 of 1 no mistake

I just want to be your man doellae neoui modeun Thing

I hope you understand what I’m saying is



I just want a good time with you

With you bonaego sip-eo

I just want spend some time

With you with you with you

I just want a good time with you

With you bonaego sip-eo

I just want spend some time

With you with you with you



Neowa hamkke bonaeneun sigan-eun naui happy hour

I manh-eun salamdeul saie neoga jeil aleumdawo

Bujoghan geon ojig siganppun-inde neolang-eun an akkawo

I bappeum sog-e neoga yeoyuleul chaj-ajuneun geosman gat-a

Neowa hagosip-eunge neomu manh-eunde Girl

Akka malhaessjiman chingu sailon bujoghae Girl

Yogsim-eun byeollo eobsjiman neoman-eun pil-yohae

Ohaega eobs-eoss-eum hae Cause girl I ain’t just talkin’ about that

Neolang sondo jabgo god meon gildo geodgessji

Neolang ibdo majchwobogo eum~ jugo badgessji

Sonkkagjil kkwag jabgonaseon dasin nohjin anhgessjiman

Nohneunda hamyeon ttalaoneun munja-e damgin du geuljaneun ‘TT’

Just like TT keopeullugdo naego sip-eun style mm

I don’t want much but just a little time

With you yeon-aesangtaeleul bakkwojugo sip-eun sai

I nolaee neoga dwaejwo naui kkeutnae juneun Rhyme



I just want a good time with you

With you bonaego sip-eo

I just want spend some time

With you with you with you

I just want a good time with you

With you bonaego sip-eo

I just want spend some time

With you with you with you



Neoege hago sip-eossdeon maldeul

Jogeum sosimhaeseo moshaessdeon maldeul

Ije yong-gi naeseo dagagalge neoui ma-eum

Neoege hago sip-eossdeon maldeul

Jogeum sosimhaeseo moshaessdeon maldeul

Ije yong-gi naeseo dagagalge neoui ma-eum

Ije bad-ajugessni neoleul hyanghan mam-eul
